rules_text:
Create two 1/1 red and blue Wizard creature tokens with haste and prowess.
You may cast an instant or sorcery with mana value 3 or less without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text:
[i]“Hey, you got it wrong, the only bad one is this girl!”
“What?? Doesn't that make you guilty by association, Marisa?”[/i]
